title: markus_d
author: markus_d
content: Did someone succeed in confirming the first payment from the civil rehabilitation proceedings?I get a javascript error when clicking on the line.RangeError: Invalid time value

comments.author: Alphakilo
comments.body: Quote from: markus_d on May 06, 2024, 07:01:32 AMDid someone succeed in confirming the first payment from the civil rehabilitation proceedings?There is a subreddit where I check and some the users there said they have received. About two days ago, one said they have received some amount. If you haven't checked there already you should check it out - https://www.reddit.com/r/mtgoxinsolvency/
